Comments_List: Outstanding course in terms of sounds/phonology/historical evolution of the language.  It has been very helpful in terms of dialects, regions, and zones of Spanish in the world as well as the Latin heritage to this language.

I appreciate how we started on time and ended on time.

Excellent use of Power Point, documents/handouts, and required readings.  I wonder if there is another survey text to accompany the David Pharies book as this would be outstanding for additional foundation.
This course is essential for L2 learners.  It provides deeper foundation, insight, and understanding about the language especially in its multiple, global expressions or dialects today.
